comment: Up until this point, Trump has been appointing SCOTUS nominees to replace relatively conservative judges on the bench. Just wait until he has to replace a liberal judge. If you thought the Left was going crazy now, theyll take it to a new level when that happens.

            :time (u / up-to

      :snt2 (w / wait-01

                                    :ARG3 (j3 / judge-01))
                              :ARG1-of (l / liberal-02)))))
      :snt3 (t2 / take-01
            :ARG0 (t3 / they)

            :time (c2 / crazy-03
                  :ARG1 (l3 / left-19)

            :condition (t4 / think-01
